TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit DSA extends System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm
Public MustInherit Class DSA Inherits AsymmetricAlgorithm

summary.span: 表示抽象基底類別，數位簽章演算法 () 的所有實作都必須從它繼承。

span.span: Represents the abstract base class from which all implementations of the Digital Signature Algorithm () must inherit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別和衍生的類別來建立數位簽章，協助您保護資料的完整性。You can use the class and derived classes to create digital signatures that help protect the integrity of your data. 提供這個類別的實作。The provides an implementation of this class. 若要使用公開金鑰系統以數位方式簽署訊息，寄件者先套用雜湊函式來建立訊息摘要。To use a public-key system to digitally sign a message, the sender first applies a hash function to the message to create a message digest. 寄件者接著會使用寄件者的私密金鑰來建立個人簽章寄件者的加密訊息摘要。The sender then encrypts the message digest with the sender's private key to create the sender's personal signature. 在收到訊息和簽章，接收者會使用寄件者的公開金鑰來復原訊息摘要簽章，並使用雜湊訊息寄件者使用的相同雜湊演算法。Upon receiving the message and signature, the receiver decrypts the signature using the sender's public key to recover the message digest and hashes the message using the same hash algorithm that the sender used. 如果接收者計算完全相符的訊息摘要寄件者收到的訊息摘要，接收者就可以假設訊息在傳輸過程中沒有遭到竄改。If the message digest that the receiver computes exactly matches the message digest received from the sender, the receiver can assume that the message was not altered while in transit. 請注意，可以驗證簽章的任何人，因為寄件者的公開金鑰是通用資訊。Note that a signature can be verified by anyone, because the sender's public key is common knowledge. 使用較新的非對稱演算法。Newer asymmetric algorithms are available. 請考慮使用類別類別，或類別而不是類別。Consider using the class, the class, or the class instead of the class. 使用只為了與舊版的應用程式和資料的相容性。Use only for compatibility with legacy applications and data. 這個演算法在 64 位元為增量來支援 1024 位元到 512 位元的金鑰長度。This algorithm supports key lengths from 512 bits to 1024 bits in increments of 64 bits.
